title: Any land under non-buildable reservations, admeasuring only upto 500 sq
clause_text: Any land under non-buildable reservations, admeasuring only upto 500 sq.mt. may be cleared by shifting the existing tenants from that site.
section: (#) Development of Reservations contemplated in Development Plan falling in the area of URC â€“
